text: Paul Alexander Yost Jr. (born January 3, 1929) is a retired United States Coast Guard admiral. He was the 18th Commandant of the United States Coast Guard from 1986 to 1990.United States Coast Guard Biography ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:American military personnel of the Korean War Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Military people from Florida
title: Paul A. Yost Jr.
